category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEDynamicIPARecursiveCreateProcessTypes
preference.preference_description: Determines Bill Of Process(BOP) object types to recursively generate the In-Process Assembly (IPA) in Sub-Hierarchies. The default values are "Mfg0MEProcStatnRevision" and "MEProcessRevision".
